text:
Oil spills also have social implications, and ‘incidents’ and ‘spills’ are referred to in ESRS S1-SBM-
3 paragraph 14 (b), ESRS S2-SBM-3 paragraph 11 (c), and ESRS S3-SBM-3 paragraph 9 (b). These
paragraphs indicate the requirements to disclose on the social implications of spillages, in
addition to the environmental ones in E2, in alignment with the principle that ESRS mutually
interact with one another.
